job.title: Remote Senior Data Engineer/ Data Scientist
job.description: ltstronggtunlimited pto every other fridays off consistently voted best places to workltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtthis jobot job is hosted by amber heigerickltbrgtltbrgtare you a fit easy apply now by clicking the apply button and sending us your resumeltbrgtltbrgtsalary per yearltbrgtltbrgtltstronggta bit about usltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwe are a well established technology company consistently voted best places to workltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwhy join usltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtwe believe that everyone deserves to thrive at the company they are part of we treat our employees like our clients without you we wouldnt have a company we give our employees unlimited pto flexible work hours and every other fridays off these are just some of our perks we have very low turnover because we have happy employees we like to promote from with in whenever possible and of the time are able to do that come join a company that you can learn grow have fun and create memories and experiences that will last a lifetimeltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtjob detailsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtas a senior data engineer data scientist you will be collaborating with product engineers and software architects to help lead and grow our initiativesltbrgtltbrgtyou should know the followingltbrgtltbrgt years as a data engineer data scientist or machine learning engineerltbrgtltbrgtproven experience in machine learning techniquesltbrgtltbrgt years deploying data science features in production and working with tools such as python spark and sqlltbrgtltbrgtexperience working with unlabled and unstructured dataltbrgtltbrgtinterested in hearing more easy apply now by clicking the apply buttonltbrgtltbrgt
